title: Drawing, "Landscape near Huino, Mexico", January 8, 1885
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on yellow/green machine-made paper
markings:
Verso: Stamped in black ink, at center :  Cooper Union/Museum/New York
Verso: Stamped in black ink, at center below the above:  Museum/for the/Arts of/Decoration/Cooper Union
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner:  Jany 8th / 85 / Huino
Verso: Inscribed in graphite, lower left corner:  Mexico
description: Horizontal view of distant hills with trees shown in the left foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape near Huino, Mexico", January 8, 1885.
January 8, 1885. Graphite, brush and white gouache on yellow/green machine-made paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-617.
